ygData.subject: Re: Doh
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I killed Lord Grimrot in a group of three L35s (the badass Grim, not the weaker one... two spawned, L25 and L35)  The L35 Grimrot carrys a no-drop scythe
ygData.messageBody:
> p.s. has anyone seen Lord Grimlot recently? I have tried clearing the skelly
> camp in SK in an effort to get him to spawn but no luck. Does he only spwan
> if the quest is initiated?

I killed Lord Grimrot in a group of three L35s (the badass Grim, not
the weaker one... two spawned, L25 and L35) The L35 Grimrot carrys
a no-drop scythe that procs something (usable, but for a quest). I
heard the rumor of the quest connected to him and Mistmoore, I never
followed up on it. He has since been removed from the game. I've not
seen him since I was in my L30s. Either he got really, really rare
and no one has cleaned the camp long enough or he's poofed. My guess
is the latter.

Harmonic.
